resources.string: Sorry! Can not add a new item, because you\'ve scheduled same item at the same time point before.
A good App you should have: SchautUp

Hello!

    Manage some features like mute, vibrate, sound of your devices with schedule, a timer, improve your daily life.

Download: market://details?id=com.schautup
